items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.title: zMoooooritz/imageframe: A lightweight Node.js application tailored for SoC's, that transforms your device into a dynamic image slideshow

items.content_html: The panorama-renderer is a lightweight package that allows you to render equirectangular panoramas using WebGL.
items.title: mediamonks/panorama-renderer: The panorama-renderer is a lightweight package that allows you to render equirectangular panoramas using WebGL.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.

items.content_html: Lightweight CMS built on Laravel 10, VueJs 2.6 and Bootstrap 5.3. An alternative platform to OctoberCMS
items.title: ttimot24/HorizontCMS: Lightweight CMS built on Laravel 10, VueJs 2.6 and Bootstrap 5.3. An alternative platform to OctoberCMS

items.content_html: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.
items.title: MrTG1B/Lumen_Dashboard: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
items.title: R0LEX7/RolexDB: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.

items.content_html: a small, lightweight app for recreating those fun photobooth strips at home
items.title: ohshuzanne/photobooth-app: a small, lightweight app for recreating those fun photobooth strips at home

items.content_html: The Dynamic Food Menu project is designed to showcase a predefined menu that updates automatically depending on the current day. This project leverages JavaScript's Date object to determine the current day and display the corresponding menu. It's a lightweight and user-friendly solution for meal planning and scheduling.
items.title: Chaitanya-2026/Dynamic-Food-Menu-with-JS: The Dynamic Food Menu project is designed to showcase a predefined menu that updates automatically depending on the current day. This project leverages JavaScript's Date object to determine the current day and display the corresponding menu. It's a lightweight and user-friendly solution for meal planning and scheduling.
